channel.title: Is Herbalist really losing Defile with the new patch?
channel.description:
Please no! I strongly oppose this change. Defile is one of my favorite abilities and it’s extremely fun and powerful. I just won a game because we defiled a Fool as Mastermind. Defiling someone as Possessor in Reaper/Sorc games is fun too.
If Herbalist must get Abscission please make it a day ability so we don’t lose Defile. Like really Defile is one of my top 3 favorite abilities in the whole game.

item.title: Is Herbalist really losing Defile with the new patch?

item.description:
Just defile everyone to be fool / assasin. And it makes the game better and confuses BD a lot more. Assasin is usually the go to
